ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | qrng.q | |- Q = ( CCfld |`s QQ ) |
| 2 |  | qabsabv.a | |- A = ( AbsVal ` Q ) |
| 3 |  | #P_absabv | |- abs e. ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_qsubdrg | |- ( QQ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) /\ ( CCfld |`s QQ ) e. DivRing ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simpli | |- QQ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) = ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) |
| 7 | 6, 1, 2 | #P_abvres | |- ( ( abs e. ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) /\ QQ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> ( abs |` QQ ) e. A ) |
| 8 | 3, 5, 7 | #P_mp2an | |- ( abs |` QQ ) e. A |
